text: Robert Nelson "Bob" Wareing, commonly known as Bob Wareing (20 August 1930 - 29 August 2014) was a British politician. He was the Member of Parliament (MP) for Liverpool West Derby from 1983 to 2010. Until November 2007, he was a Labour MP, but resigned in May 2010. Wareing died in Liverpool, Merseyside, England, aged 84."Former Merseyside MP, Bob Wareing, has died, aged 84" ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Politicians from Liverpool Category:Labour Party (UK) MPs Category:Members of the British House of Commons for English constituencies Category:UK MPs 1983–1987 Category:UK MPs 1987–1992 Category:UK MPs 1992–1997 Category:UK MPs 1997–2001 Category:UK MPs 2001–2005 Category:UK MPs 2005–2010
title: Bob Wareing
